activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12774
activity.text:
Options for admit source is from the FHIR terminology server : https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/UTG/CodeSystem-admit-source.html

If the admit source falls within any of the options, you can use this. Shifting from within the facility can be captured using locations. 

If you need to capture additional details regarding the admission, feel free to create a questionnaire for the same.
